description: The lightweight Men's PreCip Eco Jacket - Big is the environmentally-conscious update to our best-selling PreCip Rain Jacket. Offering a PFC-free DWR finish, the waterproof/breathable Marmot NanoPro™ recycled nylon face fabric lasts longer than ever thanks to the advanced technology of our microporous coating. It's topped off with the same fully functional features you love, like heat-releasing PitZips, a DriClime®-lined chin guard, stowable hood, and adjustable hem. This waterproof jacket easily stuffs into its own pocket.
name: Marmot PreCip Eco Jacket - Big - Mens
